channel.title: Changing home and Teleport On Magic Tab
channel.description:
Hey guys
need some help with my source i need to change the home teleport and where it takes me and when the users log in where they log into like say varrock , fally, draynor etc
heres a screen of where i want them to spawn and the "varrock telle" i want to change to say "home telle" :
[IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp92/blitz4tits/yygjgc.jpg[/img]
any help appreicated
any help on msn for coding overall my msn is thehorrors666@aol.com

item.title: Changing home and Teleport On Magic Tab
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

lewis`:

thanks ill have a play around and get back to u see if it works or not.

it will, lol. sorry about the teleport case though :/.

@lewis2 wrote:

thanks ill have a play around and get back to u see if it works or not.

EDIT: yea works thanks alot for that , can you give me some more advice ln how to create pk areas?

item.source: Changing home and Teleport On Magic Tab

item.title: Changing home and Teleport On Magic Tab
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“lewis`, post:6, topic:256850”][quote author=xray veeo link=topic=339196.msg2630812#msg2630812 date=1232155296]

Texthandler.java.
code for modern:

    c.sendQuest("Home", 1300);
    c.sendQuest("Teleport Home", 1301);

code for ancients:

c.sendQuest("Home", 13037); c.sendQuest("Teleport Home", 13038);

thanks ill have a look.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 06:41:14 pm[/size][hr]@ xray veeo

ok so when i go to magic tabs now i see instead of varrock telly its home telly, so now how do i change when i click it to where it takes me and when people make users where they turn up at.

good, what source do you have, delta?
[/quote]
delta yea.[/quote]
ok, i don’t code delta, so idk whats the case number for varrock tele lol.But for Where players spawn when they log in, go into player.java and search this:

// initialization packet

you should see like:

		toX = 3087+misc.random(2);
		toY = 3500+misc.random(3);

or something, but im pretty sure thats what delta has.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing home and Teleport On Magic Tab
